name: Shelltered Demo
description:
This game was made by Ida Lilja, Mads Arvedsen, Xinru Liu Fog and me (Isak Ravn), for a school project at the Royal Danish Academy of Design 2021. It is an early vertical slice representing a larger concept. 

The game is a traditional point and click game, with some novel mechanics. It is set in Victorian times, and amnesia-struck William (the player) has to solve a mystery around his fathers death, by navigating through his family’s enormous estate.
